text: In the Data Veracity - Error Codes page, under the Actions column, click the ellipsis() button and select Delete . A dialog will appear requesting you to confirm your decision. Click the Delete button to delete the error code. To delete multiple error codes, click on the check boxes at the first column in the error code table to select rows that you wish to remove. A new header will replace the current table header to reveal the Delete button that can be applied on selected error codes. A success message will appear, indicating that the error code has been successfully deleted. Deleted error code(s) will be removed from the error code table. Warning! A deleted error code can not be recovered. Note! The predefined system error codes, AGGR_UNMATCHED_UDR , and DUPLICATE_UDR , must not be deleted. These error codes are required by the system to operate properly and can not be removed.
title: Data Veracity - Deleting an Error Code - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
